title: Splt RP @Riot
body:
I have 7500+rp on this account. Was wondering if i could split into/send some into my other account so i can buy Karma bundle?
Or maybe add the option to gift bundle please?

replies.body:
If you bought the RP on the wrong account by accident and haven't spend it yet, we should be able to work something out. You'll need to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) before we can start the process though!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

what if u spent 250rp on icon? (i still have refund token)
or would it possible for you guys at riot manually add the karma bundle to my main and take rp off from my smurf?
lol
It would be nice if u add the option to gift bundles....
As long as the all the RP is still on your account, and it hasn't been too long, we should be able to help in your ticket. I saw it in the queue already, so we'll be able to help soon!
